talents.desc: Enemies hit by Thunder Clap have their Attack Speed reduced by 50% for 3 seconds.
talents.name: Reverberation

talents.desc: Thunder Clap leaves a zone on the ground that explodes after 2 seconds dealing 25 (+4 per level) damage and applying a 25% slow for 2.5 seconds.
talents.name: Thunderburn

talents.desc: Basic Attacks reduce Ability cooldowns by 0.5 seconds.
talents.name: Battle Momentum

talents.desc: Transform for 20 seconds, gaining 320 Health and causing your Basic Attacks to stun enemies.
talents.name: Avatar

talents.desc: Thunder Clap deals 300% damage if only one target is hit.
talents.name: Thunderstrike

talents.desc: Activate to heal for 50% of your maximum Health over 8 seconds. Second Wind is disabled during this time.
talents.name: Stoneform

talents.desc: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.
talents.name: Rewind

talents.desc: Storm Bolt's damage is permanently increased by 5 for each enemy Hero hit.
